name: vscode-guid
description: Insert GUIDs in different formats directly into the editor.
author: Heath Stewart (https://github.com/heaths)

commands.title: Insert GUID
commands.description: Insert a GUID at the current position(s).

commands.title: Insert many GUIDs
commands.description: Insert unique GUIDs at each position.

insertGuid.showLowercase.description: Show lowercase GUIDs (with and without braces) when presenting possible GUID formats to insert.

insertGuid.showUppercase.description: Show uppercase GUIDs (with and without braces) when presenting possible GUID formats to insert.

insertGuid.showCodeSnippets.description: Show code snippets for C++ when presenting possible GUID formats to insert.

insertGuid.pasteAutomatically.markdownDescription:
Paste GUID without prompting using the specified format:
* `{b}|{B}` inserts a braced string in lowercase `{b}` or uppercase `{B}` e.g., `{880c86bc-384c-4cce-9e9a-4f760ca755c4}`
* `{d}|{D}` inserts a hyphenated string in lowercase `{d}` or uppercase `{D}` e.g., `880c86bc-384c-4cce-9e9a-4f760ca755c4`
* `{n}|{N}` inserts an unformatted string in lowercase `{n}` or uppercase `{N}` e.g., `880c86bc384c4cce9e9a4f760ca755c4`
* `{x}|{X}` inserts a struct-formatted string in lowercase `{x}` or uppercase `{X}` e.g., `{0x880c86bc,0x384c,0x4cce,{0x9e,0x9a,0x4f,0x76,0x0c,0xa7,0x55,0xc4}}`

Other characters will be interpreted literally e.g., `new GUID("{D}")` inserts `new GUID("880C86BC-384C-4CCE-9E9A-4F760CA755C4")`
